ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters vs Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hurry up Ken!  Join the elite!   ;) ... /em covers his ears. /em covers his ears. hehe. ... Well said.  The world is full of people who aren t
ygData.messageBody:
> I got some decent exp in Sol B Saturday and Sunday (6 bubbles, 1 death).

Hurry up Ken! Join the elite! <smirk> ;)

> I did not have an enchanter in the group, so whatever crowd control we
> had fell to me. We had to handle multiple MOBs several times (four at
> once a couple of times, seven in succession a couple of times) and we
> did rather well, but we could have done better. How? If the other
> players had LISTENED TO ME WHEN I SAID TO TARGET ONE MOB OR TO
> /ASSIST XYZ. (sorry about the caps, Harm).

/em covers his ears.
/em covers his ears.

hehe.

> They didn't, probably because I'm just too gosh-darned polite
> about it. If I had been dying as a result of this, I would have
> started to yell, myself. If people continue to be clueless despite
> repeated polite nudgings, you have to [...]

Well said. The world is full of people who aren't always home
or have a few cobwebs in the attic. It's wonderful to find a
fully functional group, it's also pretty rare at lower levels.
(I must admit I've seen a good share of bunghole L40+ people too)

Harmonic, he said 'bunghole' uh huh.
